description: The Ultimate Local Weather REST API (also called City and Town Weather API) method offers unparalleled access to current weather conditions, next 14 days of accurate and reliable weather forecast, Air Quality Data, Weather Alerts, and Monthly Climate Averages for over 4 million cities and towns worldwide. Unlike other APIs that may only provide a limited number of days or less detailed data, the Ultimate Local Weather API ensures you have comprehensive information at your fingertips. The API returns an extensive array of weather elements including temperature, precipitation (rainfall), weather description, weather icon, wind speed, and more. With such rich and versatile data, the Ultimate Local Weather API outperforms other APIs like Forecast RAPIDAPI, Weatherapi.com, Weather 16 Day Forecast by providing a broader range of features and more accurate forecasts. It is the go-to choice for both personal and professional weather tracking needs.
name: ultimate_local_weather_api
